trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento permite que você personalize a aparência de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle usando o desenho do proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controlar quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>estiver definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the item.
trans-unit.target: O DrawListViewItemEventArgs passado para o manipulador de eventos contém informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>para desenhar e também fornece métodos para ajudá-lo a desenhar o item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the item to draw.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>Propriedades para recuperar informações sobre o item para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para recuperar o índice do item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>fazer o desenho real dentro da área especificada pela propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para desenhar padrão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>elementos que não é necessário para personalização, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para evitar problemas com elementos gráficos cintilação ao proprietário do desenho, substituir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Este recurso está disponível somente no Windows XP e a família Windows Server 2003, quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> superfície na qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e local do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: O local especificado por essa propriedade é em relação ao canto superior esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the bounds for specific portions of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Para recuperar os limites de partes específicas de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa os limites do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o plano de fundo do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> usando sua cor de plano de fundo atual.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para desenhar um plano de fundo padrão que usa o valor atual de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O plano de fundo é desenhado para preencher a área especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control will use the default drawing for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma propriedade que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controle usará o padrão de desenho para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` when the item does not require custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: Defina essa propriedade como `true` quando o item não requer desenho personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to customize only certain items within the control, such as selected items.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando você precisa personalizar somente determinados itens dentro do controle, como os itens selecionados.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system draws the item; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the event handler draws the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o sistema desenha o item; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o manipulador de eventos desenha o item.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> if it has focus.
trans-unit.target: Desenha um retângulo de foco para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> se ele tem o foco.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the item.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para desenhar um retângulo de foco padrão ao redor do item.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is normally drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo de foco normalmente é desenhado dentro da área especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is in the details view and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `false`, however, the focus rectangle is drawn around the default text area for the first column of the item.
trans-unit.target: Se o controle está no modo de exibição de detalhes e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é o valor da propriedade `false`, no entanto, o retângulo de foco é desenhado ao redor da área de texto padrão para a primeira coluna do item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn only when the item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo de foco é desenhado somente quando o item tiver o foco, portanto você não precisa verificar o estado de foco do item antes de chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> usando sua cor de primeiro plano atual.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para desenhar o texto de item usando os valores atuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O texto é desenhado dentro da área especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw the text manually using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode desenhar o texto manualmente usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>recuperados por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method is most useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>método é mais útil quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida como um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, this method draws the text for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, but does not draw the text for subitems.
trans-unit.target: Na exibição de detalhes, esse método desenha o texto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, mas não desenha o texto de subitens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> text in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, na exibição de detalhes, é geralmente mais conveniente desenhar todos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>texto em um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> usando sua cor de primeiro plano atual e formatação com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método para desenhar o texto de item usando os valores atuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>valores especificados no `flags` parâmetro permitem que você forneça as propriedades de formatação para o rótulo do nó, como alinhamento do texto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O texto é desenhado dentro da área especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw the text manually using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode desenhar o texto manualmente usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>recuperados por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method is most useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>método é mais útil quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é definida como um valor diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, this method draws the text for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, but does not draw the text for subitems.
trans-unit.target: Na exibição de detalhes, esse método desenha o texto para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, mas não desenha o texto de subitens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> text in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, na exibição de detalhes, é geralmente mais conveniente desenhar todos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>texto em um manipulador para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> usado para desenhar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornece propriedades e métodos úteis para o dispositivo de vídeo de desenho.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>para desenhar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade não fornece informações suficientes para atender às suas necessidades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>propriedade fornece somente as informações de estado básica que você pode usar, por exemplo, para determinar se um item é selecionado, marcado ou focalizado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade do Item, por outro lado, permite acessar todos os membros de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: You must access the item directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Você deve acessar o item diretamente, por exemplo, para desenhar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valor por conta própria em vez de usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*> collection of the containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>coleção do que contém <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para verificar se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>Desenhar está em um estado específico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the item.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade fornece somente as informações de estado básica sobre o item.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade, por exemplo, para determinar se um item é selecionado, marcado ou focalizado.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisa saber mais, recuperar o item por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>propriedade e verifique suas propriedades diretamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> valores que indica o estado atual do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.
